Position.name: Position
Position.description: Represents a functional role that is characterized by specific duties and responsibilities, and required skills and qualifications.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OccupationId.description: The ID of the occupation associated with the position.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

ScheduleType.description: The type of work schedule associated with the position. For example, part-time or full-time.

Sensitivity.description: The sensitivity of the position. Indicates the security clearance or background verification required for an individual in the position.

Type.description: The type of the position. For example, permanent or temporary.
